title: The Bee Gees: Tales of the Brothers Gibb
description: Definitive portrait of The Bee Gees, from their Manchester beginnings through a 40 year career including 60's pop stardom and the legendary soundtrack to Saturday Night Fever. Also chronicled are personal stories of triumph and tragedy, including the career slump, the divorces and the tragic death of Andy Gibb.
author: Melinda Bilyeu
